message.content: This is a factual question about the duration of a lunar cycle. A complete lunar cycle, which is the time it takes for the Moon to go through all of its phases, takes about a month. Option (B) is incorrect because a year is much longer than the duration of a lunar cycle. Option (C) is too short of a time period for a full lunar cycle. Option (D) is incorrect because a lunar cycle is longer than a day.
